segments.text: Dou you think I should join a basketball team , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not . If I were you , I certainly would .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'm afraid it will take too much of my time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As the saying goes , work value work , play value play . All work and no play make a jucky-dull boy , you know .
segments.speaker: S2
